00013 bool read_tiff(const char* filename,unsigned int width,unsigned int height,unsigned int bands, unsigned char * inputbuf);

00015 klRasterBufferPointer read_tiff (const char* filename);
00016 void writeTiffFile(const char* fileName,    klRasterBufferPointer buffer);

00018 class klTIFFSinkFunctor : public klImageFileSink
00019  {
00020  public :
00021 
00022      klTIFFSinkFunctor(const char* fileName,    klRasterBufferPointer buffer)
00023          : klImageFileSink(fileName, buffer)
00024      {
00025      }
00026 
00027      void operator()(void)
00028      {
00029          writeTiffFile(_filename, _rbp);
00030      }
00031 
00032  };
00033 
00034 class klTIFFSourceFunctor : public klImageFileSource
00035 {
00036 
00037 public :
00038 
00039     klTIFFSourceFunctor(const char* fileName) //: klImageFileSource(fileName)
00040     {
00041         _filename = fileName;
00042     }
00043 
00044     bool queryImage()
00045     {
00046         unsigned int width=0;
00047         unsigned int height=0;
00048         unsigned int bands=0;
00049 
00050         bool ans = query_tiff (getFileName(), width, height, bands);
00051         
00052         if(ans ==1)
00053         {
00054             setImageParameters( width, height,bands, 8);
00055         }
00056 
00057         return ans;
00058     }
00059 
00060     klRasterBufferPointer operator()(void)
00061     {
00062         klRasterBufferPointer rbp =  read_tiff (_filename);
00063         return rbp;
00064     }
00065 
00066 };
